column2: "Na Rehoboam sii mu kɔr Sekem: osiandɛ Israel nyinara baa Sekem dɛ wɔrebɛhyɛ no ɔhen."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Nebat ne ba Jeroboam tsee no
column5: mbrɛ oguanee fii ɔhen Solomon enyim kɔree kɛtsenae no
column7: "na wɔsomae ma wokehyiaa no bae;) nna Jeroboam na Israel dɔm no nyinara bae
column11: "W'egya yɛɛ hɛn kɔndua durdur: dɛm ntsi afei yɛ w'egya no som dzendzen no
column12: na no kɔndua durdur a ɔdze too hɛn do no

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mma me ndaansa
column4: na nkyii hom nsan mbra me nkyɛn bio. Na ɔman no twee mu kɔree."

column2: "Na ɔhen Rehoboam nye nkɔdaa a wɔsoom n'egya Solomon dɛ apamfo mber a ɔda ho tse ase no
column3: faa apam
column5: Afotu bɛn na hom dze rema me dɛ memfa nsan nkobua ɔman yi."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Sɛ ndɛ yi ɔwo eyɛ akowaa ma ɔman yi
column6: na eka nsɛm pa kyerɛ hɔn a
column7: ɔno wɔbɛyɛ wo nkowaa daa nyina."

column2: "Naaso ɔpoow nkɔdaa no hɔn afotu a wɔdze maa no no
column3: na ɔnye mberantsɛ a wɔnye no nyinii a afei wɔabɛyɛ n'apamfo no no dwenee."

column2: "Na obisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Afotu bɛn na hom dze ma
column4: ma yɛdze mbuae aasan akɛma ɔman yi a wɔaka akyerɛ me
column6: Yɛ kɔndua a w'egya dze too hɛn do no harhar no?"

column2: "Na mberantsɛ a wɔnye no nyinii no kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Ka kyerɛ ɔman yi a wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ wo dɛ
column6: yɛ no harhar ma hɛn no; dɛ: Me nsatseaba kakraba mpo yɛ dur sen m'egya n'asen."

column2: "Na afei sɛ m'egya dze kɔndua durdur soaa hom a
column3: emi so mobɔto hom kɔndua no do: sɛ m'egya dze mpire tseaa hom a
column6: "#12.11 NYANKOM NKETSEBOWA: Iyi yɛ abowa nwoma bi a wɔdze mperɛgoow etuatua mu a nna wɔdze hwe wɔ dɛm ber no mu a n'ano yɛ yaw papaapa."

column2: "Nna Jeroboam na ɔman no nyinara baa Rehoboam nkyɛn da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen no kae no

column2: "Na ɔhen no buaa ɔman no ebufuw mu
column3: na ɔpoow nkɔdaa no hɔn apam a wɔdze maa no no;"

column2: "na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mberantsɛ no hɔn apam no tse
column3: dɛ
column5: na emi dze mobɔto hom kɔndua do; m'egya dze mpire tseaa hom
column6: na emi dze medze nyankoma nketsebowa mebɛtsea hom."

column2: "Na ɔhen no enntsie ɔman no; osiandɛ nna ɔyɛ adze a EWURADZE ahyehyɛ
column3: ama ɔaama ɔno EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔnam Silonnyi Ahija nsa do kaa kyerɛɛ Nebat ba Jeroboam no etsim."

column2: "Na aber a Israel nyinara hun dɛ ɔhen no enntsie hɔn no
column3: ɔman no buaa ɔhen no dɛ
column4: Ebɛn kyɛpɛn na yɛwɔ wɔ David mu? Nkyii so yennyi egyapadze wɔ Jesse ne ba no mu: Israel e
column5: hom nkɔ hom asesee mu oo: afei David
column6: hwɛ wankasa wo fie. Nna Israel sii mu kɔr hɔn asesee mu."

column2: "Na Israelmba a wɔtsetse Juda nkurow mu no dze
column3: Rehoboam dzii hɔn do hen."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Rehoboam somaa Adoram a ɔhwɛ ɔtowyi edwuma do no; na Israel nyinara siiw no abo
column3: ma ɔtɔree. Na ɔhen Rehoboam yɛɛ ntsɛm foow ne tseaseanam dɛ oruguan akɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Nna Israel tseew etua wɔ David fi do
column3: dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Israel nyinara tsee dɛ Jeroboam fi Egypt asan aba no
column4: nna wɔsomae ma wokehyiaa no ma ɔbaa dɔm no nkyɛn
column5: na wɔhyɛɛ no hen wɔ Israel nyinara do: obiara nnyi hɔ a odzii David fi ekyir

column2: "Na aber a Rehoboam baa Jerusalɛm no
column3: ɔboaboaa Juda fi nyinara
column5: nyimpa a wɔasan mu eyi mpemɔha eduowɔtwe a wɔyɛ akofo ano
column7: adan ahendzi no ama Solomon ne ba Rehoboam bio."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn n'asɛm baa Nyame nyimpa Semaia nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column7: na Juda na Benjamin fi nyinara
column13: nkyii so mma wɔnnye hom nuanom Israelmba nnkɔko: nyimpa biara nsan nkɔ ne fie; na asɛm no fir mara. Nna wotsiee EWURADZE n'asɛm no
column15: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm no tse."

column2: "Nna Jeroboam kyekyeer Sekem wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu
column3: na ɔtsenaa mu; na ofii hɔ kɔree kɛkyekyeer Penuel."

column2: "Na Jeroboam see n'akoma mu dɛ
column3: Annhwɛ a ahendzi no bɛsan akɔ David fie:"

column2: "wɔ ber a ɔman yi fow kɔ kɔbɔ afɔr wɔ EWURADZE fie wɔ Jerusalɛm no
column3: bɛyɛ nna ɔman yi akoma adan akɔ hɔn wura nkyɛn bio
column4: mekyerɛ Judahen Rehoboam a; na woeku me
column5: na wɔasan akɔ Judahen Rehoboam nkyɛn."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no faa apam
column3: na ɔyɛɛ sika anantwimba ebien; na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Ɔdɔɔ so dodow ma hom dɛ hom bɔfow akɔ Jerusalɛm; Israel
column5: hwɛ w'enyame a wɔdze wo fi Egypt asaase do bae nye iyinom."

column2: "Na ɔdze kor kesii Bɛtɛl
column3: na ɔdze kor so kesii Dan."

column2: "Na asɛm yi maa wɔyɛɛ bɔn: osiandɛ ɔman no kɔree kɔsoom hɔn wɔ Bɛtɛl araa dze kɔr Dan."
"Na ɔyɛɛ mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm do adan
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ ɔman no mu binom a wommfi Levimba mu no asɔfo."

column2: "Na Jeroboam hyehyɛɛ afahyɛ wɔ bosoom a otsia awɔtwe no mu wɔ bosoom no ne da a otsia duenum no do
column3: ɔtse dɛ afahyɛ a ɔwɔ Juda no
column4: na ɔfowee kɔr afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn; dɛmara na ɔyɛɛ no wɔ Bɛtɛl
column5: ɔbɔɔ afɔr maa anantwimba a ɔyɛe no: na ɔdze mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm do asɔfo a ɔyɛe no guu Bɛtɛl."

column2: "Na ɔfowee kɔr afɔrmbukyia no a ɔyɛe no wɔ Bɛtɛl wɔ bosoom a otsia awɔtwe no mu da a otsia duenum no
column3: mekyerɛ bosoom a ɔbɔɔ nankasa ne tsirmu hyɛe no mu a: na ɔhyehyɛɛ afahyɛ maa Israelmba no
column4: na ɔfowee kɔr afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn dɛ ɔrekɛhyew eduhuam."
